name: Beach Ball !
description:
Hi ! My name is "Sahassavat Srichana". 
This game is part of GI471 ,Section 1207 ,No.44 BU.
My nick name is "Korn" or "Malogia" or.. "MxngZ".
The man who you see in Menu Scene  is "Kan". 
He is my Original Character. (He is Dragon!!!)

--- Follow me From this "Facebook Page" ---

And I have a special thank! to Fate/GO.
Thank you for some asset.
In this game I have used it very well.
It's so be like in Beach. I Love this BGM.
BGM : Menu and EndGame
BGM : InGame
Sound when skill used

All right!
I will continue to create games. 
In order to make a dream game.

Thanks for coming. Let's Play a Game.
" Beach Ball !!! ,Kan's Mini Game "
